edu.utexas.cs.tamerProject.agents.dynamicProgramming
Class DPAgent

java.lang.Object
  edu.utexas.cs.tamerProject.agents.GeneralAgent
      edu.utexas.cs.tamerProject.agents.dynamicProgramming.DPAgent
All Implemented Interfaces:
AgentInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
DPForceContAgent
public class DPAgent
extends GeneralAgent

Value iteration (through dynamic programming) agent This agent assumes that the state and action space are discrete and that transitions are deterministic.

Author:
bradknox

chooseGreedyAct

public Action chooseGreedyAct(Observation obs)
Chooses the action with the highest value. A tie randomly broken. Optionally, by class member giveTieToLastAct, this will choose the last action if it's tied for best.

Parameters:
obs -
Returns:
